an10.218:1.1: “Naham, bhikkhave, sancetanikanam kammanam katanam upacitanam appatisamveditva byantibhavam vadami,
an10.218:1.2: tanca kho dittheva dhamme upapajje va apare va pariyaye.
an10.218:1.3: Na tvevaham, bhikkhave, sancetanikanam kammanam katanam upacitanam appatisamveditva dukkhassantakiriyam vadami.
an10.218:2.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, tividha kayakammantasandosabyapatti akusalasancetanika dukkhudraya dukkhavipaka hoti;
an10.218:2.2: catubbidha vacikammantasandosabyapatti akusalasancetanika dukkhudraya dukkhavipaka hoti;
an10.218:2.3: tividha manokammantasandosabyapatti akusalasancetanika dukkhudraya dukkhavipaka hoti.
an10.218:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, tividha kayakammantasandosabyapatti akusalasancetanika dukkhudraya dukkhavipaka hoti …pe…
an10.218:3.2: evam kho, bhikkhave, tividha kayakammantasandosabyapatti akusalasancetanika dukkhudraya dukkhavipaka hoti.
an10.218:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, catubbidha vacikammantasandosabyapatti akusalasancetanika dukkhudraya dukkhavipaka hoti …pe…
an10.218:4.2: evam kho, bhikkhave, catubbidha vacikammantasandosabyapatti akusalasancetanika dukkhudraya dukkhavipaka hoti.
an10.218:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, tividha manokammantasandosabyapatti akusalasancetanika dukkhudraya dukkhavipaka hoti …pe…
an10.218:5.2: evam kho, bhikkhave, tividha manokammantasandosabyapatti akusalasancetanika dukkhudraya dukkhavipaka hoti.
an10.218:6.1: Tividhakayakammantasandosabyapattiakusalasancetanikahetu va, bhikkhave, satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti, catubbidhavacikammanta …pe… tividhamanokammantasandosabyapattiakusalasancetanikahetu va, bhikkhave, satta kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjanti.
an10.218:7.1: Naham, bhikkhave, sancetanikanam kammanam katanam upacitanam appatisamveditva byantibhavam vadami,
an10.218:7.2: tanca kho dittheva dhamme upapajje va apare va pariyaye.
an10.218:7.3: Na tvevaham, bhikkhave, sancetanikanam kammanam katanam upacitanam appatisamveditva dukkhassantakiriyam vadami.
an10.218:8.1: Tatra kho, bhikkhave, tividha kayakammantasampatti kusalasancetanika sukhudraya sukhavipaka hoti;
an10.218:8.2: catubbidha vacikammantasampatti kusalasancetanika sukhudraya sukhavipaka hoti;
an10.218:8.3: tividha manokammantasampatti kusalasancetanika sukhudraya sukhavipaka hoti.
an10.218:9.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, tividha kayakammantasampatti kusalasancetanika sukhudraya sukhavipaka hoti …pe…
an10.218:9.2: evam kho, bhikkhave, tividha kayakammantasampatti kusalasancetanika sukhudraya sukhavipaka hoti.
an10.218:10.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, catubbidha vacikammantasampatti kusalasancetanika sukhudraya sukhavipaka hoti …pe…
an10.218:10.2: evam kho, bhikkhave, catubbidha vacikammantasampatti kusalasancetanika sukhudraya sukhavipaka hoti.
an10.218:11.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, tividha manokammantasampatti kusalasancetanika sukhudraya sukhavipaka hoti …pe…
an10.218:11.2: evam kho, bhikkhave, tividha manokammantasampatti kusalasancetanika sukhudraya sukhavipaka hoti.
an10.218:12.1: Tividhakayakammantasampattikusalasancetanikahetu va, bhikkhave, satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti; catubbidhavacikammantasampatti …pe… tividhamanokammantasampattikusalasancetanikahetu va, bhikkhave, satta kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjanti …pe…
